name: Quite So Medieval
description:
Explore the Dutchy of Dol Magna. Find new buffs or abilities that will grant you access to new parts of the valley. Collect coins, keys and such. And find one of several endings hidden throughout the world.

Made for the Canana's Hangout Game Jam, Jan 2021

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:                                              [READ]

WASD   |   Arrow Keys    -     Movement

Space   |   Enter     -     Interact

B    -    View current buffs

Shift     -     Toggle hold movement.

Ineract: You hold interact and aim in a certain direction and let go of the space button to interact.  ---  Inspecting/reading: You can talk with others/inspect items by walking into them. ---  Hold movement: Hold movement can act slightly odd. The game was designed around the press movement, so its reccomended. But it is nice to avoid pressing over and over.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
